abstract: HSBC is changing its feathers. Two years ago, it was the canary in the global bank vault when it alerted the world to the problems of subprime mortgages. Now it’s on the verge of raising more than £12 billion.
lead_paragraph: HSBC is changing its feathers. Two years ago, it was the canary in the global bank vault when it alerted the world to the problems of subprime mortgages. Now it’s on the verge of raising more than £12 billion.

headline.main: HSBC Is Hardier Than Most Banks
